creditline: Gifts of funds from Nivin MacMillan and Mary and Bob Mersky
description: woman bending slightly at the waist, looking down, covered in floral patterned draping garments, in gold; cream colored ground with subtle gold linear floral patterning; ladybugs (or seed pods?) at woman's feet; woman wearing floral burqa holding up a grey and red machine gun vertically in LLC
markings: LLC in pencil: 4/30 | LRC publisher\'s blindstamp (symbol of a curved piece of paper)
medium: Color etching, aquatint, spit bite aquatint, drypoint, and hand coloring
title: Untitled, from "Daughter of the East"
